column3: The staff at the clothing store were rude and unhelpful.
The food at the restaurant was cold and tasted stale.
The electronics store sold me a faulty product and refused to provide a refund.
The service at the restaurant was extremely slow, and the staff were inattentive.
The jewelry store overcharged me for a necklace, and it broke after wearing it for only a few hours.
There was a hair in my food at the restaurant, and the waiter was dismissive when I complained.
The grocery store had expired products on the shelves, and the cashier was impolite.
The portion sizes at the restaurant were much smaller than advertised, and the prices were exorbitant.
The footwear store sold me shoes that fell apart after just a few days of wear.
The cleanliness of the restaurant was appalling, and there were pests running around the dining area.
The waiter at the restaurant was rude and made inappropriate comments.
The entertainment store advertised a sale, but when I went to purchase items, they were all out of stock.
The restaurant's restroom was filthy, and there was no soap or hand sanitizer available.
The grocery store cashier was extremely slow, causing long queues at the checkout.
The food served at the restaurant was not as described on the menu and tasted bland.
The apparel store had misleading pricing tags, and I ended up paying more than I expected.
The restaurant manager was unresponsive to my complaints about the poor quality of the food.
The footwear store did not have proper sizes available, and the staff were unhelpful.
The restaurant's outdoor seating area was dirty, and there were cigarette butts everywhere.
The beauty store sold me expired makeup products, and they refused to exchange them.
